build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libgobject-2.0-0 libcairo2 libpango-1.0-0 libpangocairo-1.0-0 && pip install -r requirements.txt

deploy.startCommand: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py vendor_pull && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && gunicorn system.wsgi
